name: Logic & Flow
description: Control flow nodes for branching, transformation, and scripting.

provides_nodes.name: Trigger
provides_nodes.description: Pass-through node to manually trigger or continue a flow.

provides_nodes.name: Delay
provides_nodes.description: Pauses the workflow execution for a configurable duration (in seconds) before passing data to the next node.

provides_nodes.name: Python Script
provides_nodes.description: Executes a custom Python snippet. Variables 'data' (input) and 'result' (output) are available for complex logic.

provides_nodes.name: Repeater
provides_nodes.description: Re-triggers the current flow after a delay. Set Max Repeats to 0 to run forever, or a positive number for a fixed count.

provides_nodes.name: Conditional Router
provides_nodes.description: Routes data based on conditional logic. Checks if a specific field (e.g., tool_calls) exists in the data stream. If the condition is met, the flow continues normally. If not, the flow can branch to alternate paths. Configure which nodes to connect for true/false branches.

provides_nodes.name: Scheduled Start
provides_nodes.description: Waits until a specific time before allowing the flow to proceed. Use to schedule flow execution at a specific time.
